languages.text: Инсигния выполнена из дорогого сплава — тяжелого, как взор истово верующего.
This insignia is made of an expensive alloy, heavy as the gaze of a true believer.
languages.original_text: Инсигния выполнена из дорогого сплава — тяжелого, как взор истово верующего.

traits.locale_text: This insignia is made of an expensive alloy, heavy as the gaze of a true believer.

languages.text: Cet insigne est façonné dans un alliage coûteux, aussi pesant que le regard d'un véritable fidèle.
languages.original_text: This insignia is made of an expensive alloy, heavy as the gaze of a true believer.

traits.locale_text: Cet insigne est façonné dans un alliage coûteux, aussi pesant que le regard d'un véritable fidèle.

languages.text: この記章は高価な合金で作られており、まるで真の信者の視線のように重々しい。
languages.original_text: This insignia is made of an expensive alloy, heavy as the gaze of a true believer.

traits.locale_text: この記章は高価な合金で作られており、まるで真の信者の視線のように重々しい。

languages.text: Bu nişan, gerçekten inançlı olan birinin bakışları kadar ağır, pahalı bir alaşımdan yapılmış.
languages.original_text: This insignia is made of an expensive alloy, heavy as the gaze of a true believer.

traits.locale_text: Bu nişan, gerçekten inançlı olan birinin bakışları kadar ağır, pahalı bir alaşımdan yapılmış.

languages.text: La insignia está hecha de una aleación cara, tan pesada como la mirada de un verdadero creyente.
languages.original_text: This insignia is made of an expensive alloy, heavy as the gaze of a true believer.

traits.locale_text: La insignia está hecha de una aleación cara, tan pesada como la mirada de un verdadero creyente.

languages.text: 这枚徽章由某种昂贵的合金制成，宛如虔信之人的目光一样沉重。
languages.original_text: This insignia is made of an expensive alloy, heavy as the gaze of a true believer.

traits.locale_text: 这枚徽章由某种昂贵的合金制成，宛如虔信之人的目光一样沉重。

languages.text: Die aus einer teuren Legierung hergestellten Insignien sind schwer wie der Blick eines wahren Gläubigen.
languages.original_text: This insignia is made of an expensive alloy, heavy as the gaze of a true believer.

traits.locale_text: Die aus einer teuren Legierung hergestellten Insignien sind schwer wie der Blick eines wahren Gläubigen.
